Adult.description: Prairie Falcons are more brown than the dark gray Peregrine Falcon. The underparts on adult Prairie Falcons also aren't barred like Peregrine Falcons.

Immature.description: Immature Prairie Falcons look similar to immature Peregrine Falcons, but they are paler brown with a paler mustache.

Adult male (Taiga).description: Merlins are smaller than Peregrine Falcons and they lack the Peregrine's helmeted look and thick mustache or sideburn.

Female/immature (Taiga).description: The average Merlin is substantially smaller than a Peregrine Falcon, with a more compact body, shorter wings, and a stockier appearance.

Adult gray morph.description: The Gyrfalcon is bulkier than a Peregrine Falcon and is very rare in the continental United States. They also lack the Peregrine's bold mustache.

Immature gray morph.description: Gyrfalcons are much larger and bulkier than Peregrine Falcons with a longer tail and broader more rounded wings.
